attributes.heading: Survey wall
attributes.description: I want to earn money in my app experience by allowing my users to take surveys to earn in-app currency
attributes.usageSuggestion: We suggest putting this type of content in places where your users will find the most value or in places where they may need/want to acquire a currency type. Suggestions: Earn center, End of experiences or levels, Home screens, etc.
attributes.moreInformation: Survey wall content is a great way to boost your revenue earning when placed in multiple areas that have high impact for your users.

attributes.heading: Survey wall sale
attributes.description: I want to have a limited period of time where my users are able to earn extra currency
attributes.usageSuggestion: Use this type of content to run promotional sales that will allow you to earn more money for a limited period of time.
attributes.moreInformation: We have found that having bi-weekly sales can increase revenue by 20% when sales are ran between 3 and 4 days long. When sales are ran with this interval at a 2x-3x multiplier, off-sale interaction does not usually decline.

attributes.heading: Currency sale banner
attributes.description: I want to drive more users into the survey wall during a sale and increase revenue in that period.
attributes.usageSuggestion: Use this type of sale, which does not need to be ran in conjunction with any other type of sale, to drive additional traffic into the survey wall.
attributes.moreInformation: Generally, showing a currency sale banner will add an additional 10% on top of your normal sale revenue. When a user clicks on the banner, they will go into the survey wall. Clicking the close button or anywhere outside of the banner itself will close the banner and the survey wall will not be opened.

attributes.heading: Sale interstitial
attributes.description: I want to drive the most amount of users possible into my currency sale.
attributes.usageSuggestion: Use to drive sales and also to promote a larger sale within your application. This type of promotional will cover about 80% of the screen and can help with letting users know that something big is happening.
attributes.moreInformation: Interstitials will often drive 50% more revenue during a sales period. They also require creative work so that the image is something the user will want to click on.
